title: level 18 and unlimited gold
body: Make a custom where players can try out champs and builds by being set to level 18 with unlimited gold as soon as u enter game... Would be fun to try new tactics without wasting time farming and leveling up

replies.body: This has been suggested so many times, I believe the official riot response was "meh, nothing in it for us".
they said sandbox mode will be released, but it's not on their priorities so probably not for a few seasons
Riot has been developing a sandbox for last 4 Years.
Except you lose a lot of what makes some builds good. Powerspikes in the early and midgame to make the most use out of them.
Yeah... Not like you can choose to level only **some** abilities and only buy **some** items...

> [{quoted}](name=ScarletSkolver,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qvKAbKId,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-27T02:14:25.603+0000)
>
> Except you lose a lot of what makes some builds good. Powerspikes in the early and midgame to make the most use out of them.

Well, this still opens to some builds to be viable, when they normally would not exactly because they have horrible early/mid powerspike.

For example, AP Varus has a lot of potential late game. However, nobody plays him because he requires a lot of items... and has a non-existant early and mid game. Such a game mode would allow AP Varus to actually shine. Apart from AP Varus, there are also other champions which take a while to scale... such as AD bruiser Fizz, tank Akali, AP Ezreal, Aurelion Sol, Tristana... A game mode like this would allow those champions and builds to finally shine

Do not use logic, people will be upset.

Everyone thinks that they are a trend setter
its not logically for elo hell players trying new builds in rank but they still do, this can reduce that threat for serious gamers

not really, cause they are going ot see an end result that has partial success but not be able to replicate it in a real game. When you buy items, power spikes, being able to CS are all important to the end game build. If you need 15k for your build to work but in game but can only archive 7k. Your build will never function anyways but the player will have proof of end game concept.

Hell max builds are very rarely reached in the silver through plat range. The games are usually way one sided to worry about that far. It takes team to much team work for a come from behind victory, and in rank normaly it does not exist.
Genius! I tried it and it worked and I am a diamond player. Would definitely recommend it to silvers and golds{{champion:22}}
i agree, makes trolls stop trying new builds that dont work in rank
that would be pretty dope actually... try new builds with no wasted time

awesome idea dude. i totally agree.
> Make a custom where players can try out champs and builds by being set to level 18 with unlimited gold as soon as u enter game... Would be fun to try new tactics without wasting time farming and leveling up
Why would flat runes matter then?
What about a rotating gamemode with this? Maybe ascension where you consistently fight so you can try funny build like full crit fiddlestick
Oh... Sandbox mode? I think they said they wont make it. Not 100% sure.

Hitting full build and final level instantly would lead to a game so warped that it would be meaningless. It wouldn't account for build order, proper lane matchups, power spikes, etc, etc.

Being able to set the level manually would be better, but other issues would remain.

...Yeah, so... they kinda... ya know... have given us an answer...

"eventually"
-Riot
